enhanced_description: EduThrill, offered by Talent Titan, is presented as India's first Artificial Intelligence (AI) driven gamified platform designed as a comprehensive Talent Lifecycle Suite. It provides SAAS and TurnKey solutions to revolutionize end-to-end hiring, employer branding, and workforce development. The platform offers well-integrated, automated workflows for candidate attraction, AI screening, and gamified assessments, enabling talent acquisition teams to efficiently source, filter, and hire top talent at scale, specifically accelerating volume hiring drives. Beyond recruitment, EduThrill delivers unique training solutions, including digitized, gamified micro-learning modules for employee induction and a robust learning management system, supporting standardized and scalable workforce development for distributed teams. Its offerings also extend to proctored examinations and interview preparation assessments, catering to a diverse audience including corporations, institutes, students, and job seekers.
